com.mapdigit.gis.navigation

Class NavigationEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapdigit.gis.location.LocationProvider
      • com.mapdigit.gis.navigation.NavigationEngine

  • public class NavigationEngine
extends LocationProvider
    Navigation Engine. it include 3 threads , 1) location monitor thread used to monitor current location againest current navigation route if there's one and ajust raw location to the nearest position on the route. 2) voice command generate thread create upcoming voice command based on current step and location and put them to the voice command queue. 3) voice command processor pick up the voice command from the queue and notify the voice command listener.

    © Copyright 2009 Guidebee Pty Ltd.

      • cancelNavigation

      • startNavigation

        public void startNavigation(MapDirection mapDirection,
                   WayPoint[] wayPointArray)
        Start navigation.
        Parameters:
        mapDirection - the map direction used to navigation,it can be null, if it's null,navigation engine will try to use digital map service to find the diection from current location to all it's first way point. the last wayPoint is considered as the destination.
        wayPointArray - way point array.

      • setNavigationListener

        public void setNavigationListener(INavigationListener listener,
                         int interval,
                         int timeout,
                         int maxAge)
        Adds a LocationListener for updates at the defined interval. The listener will be called with updated location at the defined interval. The listener also gets updates when the availablilty state of the Device changes. Passing in -1 as the interval selects the default interval which is dependent on the used location method. Only one listener can be registered with each LocationProvider instance. Setting the listener replaces any possibly previously set listener. Setting the listener to null cancels the registration of any previously set listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to be registered. If set to null the registration of any previously set listener is cancelled.
        interval - The interval in seconds. -1 is used for the default interval of this provider.
        timeout - Timeout value in seconds, must be greater than 0. If the value is -1, the default timeout for this provider is used.
        maxAge - Maximum age of the returned location in seconds,must be greater than 0 or equal to -1 to indicate that the default maximum age for this provider is used.

      • startSimulation

        public void startSimulation(MapDirection mapDirectionSimu,
                   int speed,
                   boolean isMile)
        Start simualtion
        Parameters:
        mapDirectionSimu - map direction object, cannot be null.
        speed - simulation driving speed in kph or mile/h
        isMile - is mile or not.

        public void setDistanceUnit(boolean useKilometer)

        Parameters:

      • setMoreVoiceCommand

        public void setMoreVoiceCommand(boolean moreVoiceCommand)
        set if the navigation engines give more or less voice command . default is false, then for each turn ,maximum 4 voice commands.
        Parameters:
        moreVoiceCommand - true, navigation will give more voice command.
